title: Did Not Receive Response from Server; Retrying (Attempt 1,2,3 ...)
body: First time trying to play League on windows 10 and I am receiving this message Did Not Receive Response from Server; Retrying (Attempt 1,2,3 ...). I used to play league on this same Asus laptop, but it was windows 7. I cannot find any help online for fixes with windows 10 with Microsoft edge. Any help will be appreciated.

replies.body: thanks for the response. I checked my drivers and they are up to date. I also downloaded the hextech repair tool and everything checks out except for (Copying Persisted Settings Configuration... Failed). Could this be the issue?

With the OS update, it's important to make sure that all of your [drivers are updated](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+#wq2) accordingly, and that your network settings are in order.  Otherwise, you may end up with not just connection issues, but potential crashes as well.  Now your network does seem to be having problems establishing a connection, so I would suggest going each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, these resources will get your pc tuned up and ready to play!
